CustomField.description: In the corporate currency, the amount of revenue that is scheduled for recognition within the relevant time period for the Milestone revenue source, when using the Equal Split recognition method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In the corporate currency, the amount of revenue that is scheduled for recognition within the relevant time period for the Milestone revenue source, when using the Equal Split recognition method.
CustomField.label: Corp: Equal Split: Milestone: Scheduled
